name: moodle/moodle
description: Moodle - the world's open source learning platform

suggest.ext-mysqli: Needed when Moodle uses MySQL or MariaDB database.
suggest.ext-pgsql: Needed when Moodle uses PostgreSQL database.
suggest.ext-sqlsrv: Needed when Moodle uses MS SQL Server database.
suggest.ext-oci8: Needed when Moodle uses Oracle database.
suggest.ext-tokenizer: Enabling Tokenizer PHP extension is recommended, it improves Moodle Networking functionality.
suggest.ext-soap: Enabling SOAP PHP extension is useful for web services and some plugins.
suggest.ext-sodium: Enabling Sodium PHP extension is recommended, it is used by Moodle encryption API.
suggest.ext-exif: Enabling Exif PHP extension is recommended, it is used by Moodle to parse image meta data.
